all_findings.title: Unlimited Withdrawal: withdraw()
all_findings.description: Function `withdraw()` allows withdrawal without amount limits. Attacker can drain all available funds in single transaction. Missing: maxWithdrawal check or amount restrictions.

evidence.fix_suggestion: Add require(amount <= maxWithdrawal, 'Exceeds limit') or implement withdrawal limits per user/period

attack_vectors.description: Reentrancy vulnerability combined with fund transfer

all_findings.title: Missing Access Control on Withdrawal Function
all_findings.description: Function `withdraw()` is withdrawal without access control modifiers. Any caller can invoke this function. NFTBTC C001/H001/H002: Add onlyOwner, onlyAdmin, or role-based access control.

evidence.fix_suggestion: Add modifier to function declaration: `function withdraw(...) external onlyOwner {...}`

attack_vectors.description: Access control issues that could lead to privilege escalation

all_findings.title: Potential Taint Flow in deposit
all_findings.description: Untrusted input (msg.value, msg.sender) may reach sensitive operation (send) without proper validation

provenance.fix_suggestion: Add require() or assert() to validate input before sensitive operations

all_findings.title: Potential Taint Flow in withdraw
all_findings.description: Untrusted input (msg.sender) may reach sensitive operation (send) without proper validation

provenance.fix_suggestion: Add require() or assert() to validate input before sensitive operations

all_findings.title: Liquidity provision without minimum check
all_findings.description: Liquidity addition at line 19 lacks minimum amount validation

evidence.recommendation: Add minimum liquidity requirement to prevent dust attacks

all_findings.title: Burn mechanism should be validated
all_findings.description: Burn at line 25 needs proper access control

evidence.recommendation: Ensure burn cannot be bypassed or abused

all_findings.title: Missing nonReentrant Modifier on deposit()
all_findings.description: Function makes external calls or transfers ETH but lacks nonReentrant modifier. External calls: 0, ETH transfers: 0. This function should have reentrancy protection.

evidence.fix_suggestion: Add `nonReentrant` modifier from OpenZeppelin's ReentrancyGuard. Import: `import '@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/ReentrancyGuard.sol';` Usage: `function deposit(...) external nonReentrant { ... }`

attack_vectors.description: Reentrancy vulnerability combined with fund transfer

all_findings.title: Missing nonReentrant Modifier on withdraw()
all_findings.description: Function makes external calls or transfers ETH but lacks nonReentrant modifier. External calls: 0, ETH transfers: 0. This function should have reentrancy protection.

evidence.fix_suggestion: Add `nonReentrant` modifier from OpenZeppelin's ReentrancyGuard. Import: `import '@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/ReentrancyGuard.sol';` Usage: `function withdraw(...) external nonReentrant { ... }`

attack_vectors.description: Reentrancy vulnerability combined with fund transfer

all_findings.title: Consider adding payable modifier if function should receive ETH
all_findings.description: Function at line 24 might benefit from payable modifier

evidence.recommendation: Add payable if function should accept ETH, saves gas by skipping check

all_findings.title: Missing @param documentation for function parameters
all_findings.description: Function at line 24 has parameters but no @param documentation

evidence.recommendation: Add @param for each function parameter

all_findings.title: Multiple consecutive empty lines
all_findings.description: Multiple empty lines at line 37

evidence.recommendation: Use single empty line for separation

all_findings.title: Public function could be external
all_findings.description: Function at line 24 is public but appears to only be called externally

evidence.recommendation: Change visibility to external to save gas

all_findings.title: Negative numbers cost more gas
all_findings.description: Negative number at line 1 costs extra gas

evidence.recommendation: Use subtraction or unsigned types when possible

all_fixes.explanation: Added onlyOwner modifier to critical function
all_fixes.diff:
--- original
+++ fixed
@@ -1 +1 @@
- function withdraw(uint256 amount) public virtual 
+ function withdraw(uint256 amount) public onlyOwner virtual
